nodes.text: Doza Tower, also referred to as High Tower, was a tower located on the Colossus, a refueling platform on the ocean planet Castilon. It was considered a luxurious space, and as such, most Colossus inhabitants dreamed of living there. The Aces' Lounge was located within Doza Tower. The top of the tower was occupied by Captain Imanuel Doza's office and the Colossus' long-disused command bridge. Doza reopened the command bridge after the Colossus was relaunched into space to escape the First Order.
